title: Port stats command to Cobra
description: Migrate stats command (show repository statistics) to Cobra.
closed_reason: Ported stats command to Cobra. Created stats.go with --all and --json flags, added formatStatusCounts/formatPriorityCounts/formatTypeCounts helpers locally. Added 'stats' to Cobra routing in main.go. Command shows repo stats including total ticks, status/priority/type breakdowns, and ready/blocked counts.
